lead_paragraph: STREIT--Jean. January 25th we lost bright, beautiful Jean Streit, a talented actress, loving wife of the late Honorable Saul Streit, Justice of New York Supreme Court, loving mother of the late Saul Jr., warm hearted, witty friend to so many others. Memorial services to be held at Church of the Holy Trinity, 316 East 88th Street, New York, 11am on February 12th. 1/3
